title: A light shining out of darknes [sic], or, Occasional queries submitted to the judgment of such as would enquire into the true state of things in our times
author: Stubbe, Henry, 1632-1676.
notes: Attributed to Henry Stubbe. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.); Wing.
Also attributed to Sir H. Vane. Cf. BM.
Reproduction of original in Harvard University Library.
